rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Bohemian decor and natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living area adjoining the kitchen; rich textures and vibrant colors reflecting Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space with a central island, enhancing communal feel.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen area designed for functionality and style, featuring open shelving and vibrant accents.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy library with abundant natural light and storage for books; adheres to Vastu by ensuring proper alignment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom positioned in the northeast corner as per Vastu principles; features an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom with ample storage and Bohemian decor elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Slightly larger guest room offering comfortable sleeping arrangements.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Common bathroom located near guest bedroom; incorporates natural elements for a calming ambiance.

rooms.name: Dressing Room
rooms.description: Separate dressing area adjacent to master bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Large arched door allowing natural light in the entrance hall.
Floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize daylight and maintain Vastu alignment.
Seamless connection between dining area and kitchen, promoting airflow and social interaction.
Large windows placed in the north-east direction to enhance knowledge and creativity as per Vastu.
Windows oriented east for a warm, energizing morning light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Second-floor master bedroom with enhanced privacy and scenic views; en-suite bathroom remains.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom on the upper level with Bohemian wall art and storage solutions.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional sleeping area designed for guests or family members.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated study space with ample natural light and minimalistic Bohemian decor to inspire creativity.

rooms.name: Closet Area
rooms.description: Storage area integrated within the bedrooms for efficient organization.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: Circulation space connecting various rooms on the upper floor.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows to ensure proper airflow and Vastu compliance.
Open balcony overlooking the garden to enhance relaxation and creative thought.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom designed with Bohemian accents for a homely feel.

rooms.name: Kids Room
rooms.description: Spacious kids' room featuring playful decor and functional storage.

rooms.name: Playroom
rooms.description: Dedicated play area for children with safety features and vibrant colors.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional room for laundry and storage; designed to support household operations.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Open balcony area providing scenic views and outdoor living space.

openings.description: Windows ensuring adequate ventilation and natural light.
Door leading to a small balcony for drying clothes in sunlight.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample space and access to the main building for convenience and security.

openings.description: Large automated door designed for easy access and adheres to local building codes.
